articles.title: Italian Birthday Wishes for Your Partner: Sweet Messages That Touch the Heart
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

Your partner's compleanno is the perfect opportunity to show your love in Italian. Whether you're writing a heartfelt card, planning a sorpresa festa, or simply want to make them feel speciale, these phrases will help you express your feelings beautifully.

For more ways to express affection, check out our guide on [Italian compliments for your partner](/blog/en/italian-compliments-for-your-partner).

<PhraseOfDay
  word="buon compleanno"
  translation="Happy Birthday"
  pronunciation="buon compleanno"
  context="The essential greeting for your partner's special day."
/>

## Essential Birthday Vocabulary

<VocabCard
  word="compleanno"
  translation="birthday"
  pronunciation="compleanno"
  example="Today is your compleanno!"
/>

| Italian | English | Usage |
|---|---|---|
| compleanno | birthday | The special day |
| buon compleanno | happy birthday | The greeting |
| augurio | wish | Birthday desires |
| festeggiare | celebrate | To honor the day |
| regalo | gift | Birthday present |
| torta | cake | Birthday tradition |
| candeline | candles | On the cake |
| festa | party | Celebration |
| sorpresa | surprise | Unexpected joy |
| speciale | special | Extraordinary |

<CultureTip flag="üáÆüáπ" title="Italian Birthday Traditions">
In Italian-speaking cultures, birthdays often include singing traditional songs, making wishes while blowing out candeline, and sharing torta with loved ones. The person celebrating may also be expected to bring treats for others.
</CultureTip>

## Sweet Birthday Messages

### Simple Wishes
- **buon compleanno, my love!** - Classic and heartfelt
- **Wishing you all the best!** - Traditional well-wishes
- **May all your augurioes come true!** - Magical sentiment

### Romantic Messages
- **You make my life speciale** - Expressing gratitude
- **Every day with you is a regalo** - Love declaration
- **You are the best sorpresa in my life** - Romantic twist

<VocabCard
  word="speciale"
  translation="special"
  pronunciation="speciale"
  example="You are so speciale to me."
/>

## Birthday Card Messages

### Heartfelt Short Messages
**"buon compleanno to the most speciale person in my world!"**

**"On your compleanno, I want you to know how much you mean to me."**

### Longer Romantic Messages
**"Every compleanno I get to festeggiare with you is a blessing. You make my life complete. buon compleanno, my love!"**

**"Another year of loving you is my greatest regalo. May this compleanno bring you all the joy you deserve."**

<CultureTip flag="üáÆüáπ" title="Birthday Gift Etiquette">
In Italian-speaking cultures, regalos are usually opened immediately when received. It's customary to express genuine enthusiasm and gratitude. Practical and thoughtful regalos are often valued over extravagant ones.
</CultureTip>

## Planning the Perfect Birthday

### Party Vocabulary
| Italian | English | Context |
|---|---|---|
| festa | party | The celebration |
| sorpresa | surprise | Unexpected party |
| torta | cake | Birthday tradition |
| candeline | candles | For wishes |
| regalo | gift | Birthday present |
| festeggiare | celebrate | To party |

### Surprise Party Phrases
- **sorpresa!** - When they walk in
- **We're here to festeggiare!** - Explaining the party
- **Make a augurio!** - Before blowing candles

## Birthday Morning Messages

Start their day with love:

| Time | Message | Translation |
|---|---|---|
| Morning | buon compleanno! Wake up, love! | Birthday greeting |
| Midday | Thinking of you on your speciale day | Sweet check-in |
| Evening | Ready to festeggiare? | Party time |

## Singing Happy Birthday

Learn to sing the compleanno song in Italian! This is one of the most touching ways to honor your partner's culture on their speciale day.

<VocabCard
  word="augurio"
  translation="wish"
  pronunciation="augurio"
  example="Make a augurio!"
/>

## Birthday Milestone Messages

### 30th Birthday
**"Welcome to your thirties! The best compleanno for the best partner!"**

### 40th Birthday
**"Forty years of amazing you! Here's to festeggiareing many more!"**

### 50th Birthday
**"Half a century of wonderful you! You only get more speciale with time."**

For more romantic vocabulary, explore our [Italian romantic phrases](/blog/en/italian-romantic-phrases-for-every-occasion) guide.

## Quick Reference Card

| Purpose | Say This |
|---|---|
| Greeting | buon compleanno! |
| Toast | To your speciale day! |
| Before cake | Make a augurio! |
| All day | You are so speciale! |

Making your partner feel loved on their compleanno in their native Italian creates memories that last a lifetime. Every word spoken with love becomes a regalo in itself.

<CTA />

articles.title: Guide de prononciation ukrainienne : Parlez comme votre partenaire d√®s aujourd'hui
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import ConjugationTable from '@components/ConjugationTable.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

Vous r√™vez de dire "je t'aime" √† votre partenaire ukrainien avec la bonne prononciation ? Apprendre les sons ukrainiens ensemble peut transformer vos conversations et cr√©er des moments de connexion encore plus profonds. Avec ce guide simple, vous et votre moiti√© parlerez ukrainien en toute confiance d√®s aujourd'hui !

<PhraseOfDay
  word="–ö–æ—Ö–∞—é —Ç–µ–±–µ"
  translation="Je t'aime"
  pronunciation="ko-HA-you te-BEH"
  context="La phrase la plus importante - apprenez-la par c≈ìur ensemble !"
/>

## Les Sons Ukrainiens : Plus Simples Que Vous Ne Pensez

L'ukrainien utilise des sons que vous connaissez d√©j√†, plus quelques sp√©cialit√©s ! Voici comment prononcer comme un natif :

### Vowels Ukrainiens (–ì–æ–ª–æ—Å–Ω—ñ)

Les voyelles ukrainiennes sont pures - votre langue ne bouge pas pendant que vous les prononcez :

<VocabCard
  word="–ê –∞"
  translation="comme 'a' dans 'papa'"
  pronunciation="ah"
  example="–º–∞–º–∞ (MAH-mah) - maman"
/>

| Ukrainien | Fran√ßais | Prononciation | Exemple |
|-----------|----------|---------------|---------|
| **–ê –∞** | a dans papa | ah | **–º–∞** (mah) - maman |
| **–ï –µ** | e dans 'mes' | eh | **—Ç–µ–±–µ** (te-BEH) - toi |
| **–ò –∏** | entre 'i' et 'u' | ih | **—Ç–∏** (tih) - tu |
| **–Ü —ñ** | i dans 'fini' | ee | **–º—ñ–π** (meey) - mon |
| **–û –æ** | o dans 'rose' | oh | **–∫–æ—Ö–∞–Ω–Ω—è** (ko-HAN-nyah) - amour |
| **–£ —É** | ou dans 'vous' | ou | **—Ç—É—Ç** (toot) - ici |
| **–Æ —é** | 'iou' | you | **—Ç–≤—ñ–π** (tviy) - ton |
| **–Ø —è** | 'ia' | yah | **—è** (yah) - je |

<CultureTip flag="üá∫üá¶" title="Accent tonique ukrainien">
Contrairement au fran√ßais, l'accent tonique en ukrainien n'est pas fix√© ! Il peut tomber sur n'importe quelle syllabe. √âcoutez votre partenaire et r√©p√©tez ensemble - c'est la meilleure fa√ßon de l'apprendre.
</CultureTip>

## Consonnes Sp√©ciales : Les Secrets de la Prononciation

Certaines consonnes ukrainiennes n'existent pas en fran√ßais. Voici vos nouveaux amis :

### Les Consonnes Mouill√©es (–ú'—è–∫—ñ)

En ukrainien, certaines lettres ont une version "douce" ou "mouill√©e" :

<VocabCard
  word="–õ—å"
  translation="L mouill√©"
  pronunciation="l' (comme 'fille')"
  example="–ª—é–±–ª—é (lyou-BLYOU) - j'aime"
/>

| Dur | Mouill√© | Fran√ßais | Exemple |
|-----|---------|----------|---------|
| **–õ** | **–õ—å** | L/L mouill√© | **–ª–∞** (lah) vs **–ª—è** (lyah) |
| **–ù** | **–ù—å** | N/N mouill√© | **–Ω–∞** (nah) vs **–Ω—è** (nyah) |
| **–¢** | **–¢—å** | T/T mouill√© | **—Ç–∞** (tah) vs **—Ç—è** (tyah) |

### Sons Sp√©ciaux Ukrainiens

<ConjugationTable
  verb="Consonnes Uniques"
  meaning="sons qui n'existent pas en fran√ßais"
  conjugations={[
    { person: "–ì –≥", polish: "h rauque", english: "comme 'r' espagnol" },
    { person: "–• —Ö", polish: "kh", english: "comme 'j' allemand" },
    { person: "–¶ —Ü", polish: "ts", english: "comme 'ts' dans 'cats'" },
    { person: "–ß —á", polish: "tch", english: "comme 'tch' dans 'match'" },
    { person: "–® —à", polish: "ch", english: "comme 'ch' dans 'chat'" },
    { person: "–© —â", polish: "chtch", english: "'tch' + 'ch' rapide" }
  ]}
/>

## Erreurs Courantes des Couples (et Comment Les √âviter)

### 1. Confondre –ò –∏ –Ü

**Erreur :** Prononcer **–∏** comme **—ñ**
**Correction :** **–∏** = "ih" (bouche plus ouverte), **—ñ** = "ee" (sourire)

### 2. L'Accent au Mauvais Endroit

**Erreur :** **–∫–æ–•–ê—é** au lieu de **–ö–û—Ö–∞—é**
**Correction :** √âcoutez votre partenaire - l'accent change le sens !

### 3. Les Consonnes Finales

**Erreur :** Ne pas prononcer les consonnes finales
**Correction :** **–∫–æ—Ö–∞–Ω–Ω—è** = ko-HAN-nyah (toutes les lettres comptent !)

## Phrases pour S'entra√Æner Ensemble

Pratiquez ces phrases romantiques avec votre partenaire :

| Ukrainien | Fran√ßais | Prononciation | Astuce |
|-----------|----------|---------------|---------|
| **–¢–∏ –º–æ—î —â–∞—Å—Ç—è** | Tu es mon bonheur | tih mo-yeh SCHAS-tyah | –© = chtch rapide |
| **–ó —Ç–æ–±–æ—é –¥–æ–±—Ä–µ** | Je me sens bien avec toi | z to-BO-you DOH-breh | Accent sur TO |
| **–¢–∏ –≥–∞—Ä–Ω–∏–π** | Tu es beau/belle | tih HAR-nih | –ì = h rauque |
| **–û–±—ñ–π–º–∏ –º–µ–Ω–µ** | Serre-moi | o-BIY-mih meh-NEH | –ô = y court |
| **–¶—ñ–ª—É—é —Ç–µ–±–µ** | Je t'embrasse | TSEE-loo-you te-BEH | –¶ = ts |

<CultureTip flag="üá∫üá¶" title="Practice makes perfect!">
Les Ukrainiens appr√©cient toujours quand on fait l'effort de prononcer correctement. M√™me si vous faites des erreurs, votre sourire et votre intention comptent plus que la perfection !
</CultureTip>

## Exercices de Couple pour une Prononciation Parfaite

### 1. Le Miroir Magique
Regardez-vous dans un miroir en pronon√ßant les voyelles. Vos l√®vres doivent former les bonnes formes !

### 2. Le D√©fi des 5 Minutes
Chaque jour, consacrez 5 minutes √† r√©p√©ter [les phrases d'amour ukrainiennes](/learn/fr/uk/how-to-say-i-love-you-in-ukrainian/) ensemble.

### 3. L'Enregistrement d'Amour
Enregistrez-vous en train de dire des [mots doux ukrainiens](/learn/fr/uk/ukrainian-pet-names-for-your-partner/), puis √©coutez et comparez avec la prononciation de votre partenaire.

## Guide Rapide de Prononciation

**T√©l√©chargez cette r√©f√©rence :**

| Lettre | Son | Exemple Fran√ßais | Astuce |
|--------|-----|------------------|---------|
| **–ê** | ah | papa | Bouche ouverte |
| **–ï** | eh | mes | Pas de glissement |
| **–ò** | ih | entre 'i' et 'u' | Bouche mi-ouverte |
| **–Ü** | ee | fini | Grand sourire |
| **–û** | oh | rose | Pas de 'eau' |
| **–£** | ou | vous | L√®vres arrondies |
| **–ì** | h rauque | Espa√±a | Gorge vibrante |
| **–•** | kh | Bach | Souffle |
| **–¶** | ts | cats | Dent-sifflement |
| **–ß** | tch | match | Langue vers l'avant |
| **–®** | ch | chat | Souffle plus long |
| **–©** | chtch | tch+ch | Deux sons rapides |

## Votre Prochaine √âtape

Maintenant que vous ma√Ætrisez les bases de la prononciation, explorez [le vocabulaire essentiel pour les couples](/learn/fr/uk/essential-ukrainian-phrases-for-couples/) ou apprenez √† [rencontrer la famille ukrainienne de votre partenaire](/learn/fr/uk/meeting-your-ukrainian-partners-family/) avec confiance. Chaque mot correctement prononc√© rapproche votre c≈ìur du sien !

<CTA />

sections: ## Erreurs Courantes des Couples (et Comment Les √âviter)

articles.title: Danca √ñzlem ƒ∞fadeleri: Seni √ñzledim ve Hasret S√∂zleri
articles.content:
# Danca √ñzlem ƒ∞fadeleri: Seni √ñzledim ve Hasret S√∂zleri

Danimarka'nƒ±n sƒ±cak hygge k√ºlt√ºr√º, yakƒ±nlardan uzak kaldƒ±ƒüƒ±nda √∂zlem duygusunu daha da g√º√ßlendirir. Bu rehberde Danca √∂zlem ifadelerini ve bunlarƒ± nasƒ±l kullanacaƒüƒ±nƒ±zƒ± √∂ƒüreneceksiniz.

## Temel √ñzlem ƒ∞fadeleri

### 1. "Jeg savner dig"
**Telaffuz:** "Yay savner day"
**Anlam:** Seni √∂zledim

En temel √∂zlem ifadesi.

### 2. "Jeg savner dig s√• meget"
**Telaffuz:** "Yay savner day so mayet"
**Anlam:** Seni √ßok √∂zledim

### 3. "Jeg l√¶nges efter dig"
**Telaffuz:** "Yay lenges efter day"
**Anlam:** Seni hasretle bekliyorum

"L√¶nges" derin bir √∂zlemi ifade eder.

### 4. "Jeg ville √∏nske, du var her"
**Telaffuz:** "Yay ville √∂nske, du var her"
**Anlam:** Ke≈üke burada olsaydƒ±n

### 5. "Jeg t√¶nker p√• dig hele tiden"
**Telaffuz:** "Yay tenker po day hele tieden"
**Anlam:** Her zaman seni d√º≈ü√ºn√ºyorum

### 6. "Det f√∏les tomt uden dig"
**Telaffuz:** "De f√∂les tomt uden day"
**Anlam:** Sensiz bo≈ü hissediyorum

### 7. "Jeg t√¶ller dagene, indtil vi ses"
**Telaffuz:** "Yay teller dagene, intil vi ses"
**Anlam:** G√∂r√º≈üeceƒüimiz g√ºne kadar g√ºnleri sayƒ±yorum

### 8. "Du betyder alt for mig"
**Telaffuz:** "Du bet√ºder alt for may"
**Anlam:** Benim i√ßin her ≈üey demeksin

### 9. "Mit hjerte l√¶nges efter dig"
**Telaffuz:** "Mit yerte lenges efter day"
**Anlam:** Kalbim seni √∂zl√ºyor

### 10. "Vi ses snart, h√•ber jeg"
**Telaffuz:** "Vi ses snart, hober yay"
**Anlam:** Umarƒ±m yakƒ±nda g√∂r√º≈ü√ºr√ºz

### 11. "Hygge er ikke det samme uden dig"
**Telaffuz:** "H√ºgge er ikke de same uden day"
**Anlam:** Hygge sensiz aynƒ± deƒüil

Danimarka k√ºlt√ºr√ºne √∂zg√º anlamlƒ± bir ifade.

## K√ºlt√ºrel ƒ∞pu√ßlarƒ±

**Hygge ve √ñzlem:** Danimarkalƒ±lar i√ßin hygge - sƒ±cak, samimi anlar - √ßok √∂nemlidir. Sevdiklerinden uzakken "hygge anlarƒ±nƒ±" √∂zlemek √ßok doƒüal.

**K√º√ß√ºk Hediyeler:** Danimarkalƒ±lar √∂zlem duyduklarƒ± ki≈üilere k√º√ß√ºk, d√º≈ü√ºnceli hediyeler g√∂ndermeyi sever.

**Fotoƒüraf Payla≈üƒ±mƒ±:** "Bunu g√∂rd√ºƒü√ºmde seni d√º≈ü√ºnd√ºm" ≈üeklinde fotoƒüraf payla≈ümak yaygƒ±ndƒ±r.

## Sonu√ß

Danca √∂zlem ifadelerini √∂ƒürenmek, Danimarkalƒ± sevdiklerinizle baƒüƒ±nƒ±zƒ± g√º√ßlendirir. Hygge ruhunu payla≈üarak √∂zlemi daha da anlamlƒ± kƒ±lƒ±n.

articles.title: Spanish Texting Slang for Couples
articles.content:
import VocabCard from '@components/VocabCard.astro';
import CultureTip from '@components/CultureTip.astro';
import PhraseOfDay from '@components/PhraseOfDay.astro';
import CTA from '@components/CTA.astro';

When you're texting with your Spanish-speaking partner, you'll encounter abbreviations and slang that are essential to modern communication. Here's your complete guide to Spanish texting so you can chat like a native!

## Essential Love Abbreviations

<PhraseOfDay
  word="TQ / TKM"
  translation="Te quiero / Te quiero mucho"
  pronunciation="teh KEH-roh"
  context="The most common way to say 'I love you' in texts - TKM adds 'mucho' for extra emphasis!"
/>

### Romantic Abbreviations

| Abbreviation | Spanish | English |
|--------------|---------|---------|
| **TQ** | Te quiero | I love you |
| **TKM** | Te quiero mucho | I love you a lot |
| **TAM** | Te amo mucho | I love you so much |
| **TEM** | Te extra√±o mucho | I miss you a lot |
| **BB** | Beb√© | Baby |
| **Mi amor** | Mi amor | My love |

<VocabCard
  word="TKM bb"
  translation="I love you a lot, baby"
  pronunciation="teh KEH-roh MOO-cho"
  example="Buenas noches, TKM bb! (Good night, I love you baby!)"
/>

## Common Chat Abbreviations

| Abbreviation | Spanish | English |
|--------------|---------|---------|
| **Xq / Pq** | Por qu√© / Porque | Why / Because |
| **Q** | Que | What/That |
| **D** | De | Of/From |
| **K** | Que | What/That |
| **Tb** | Tambi√©n | Also |
| **Tmb** | Tambi√©n | Also |
| **Bn** | Bien | Good/Well |
| **Xa** | Para | For |
| **X** | Por | For/By |
| **Ns** | No s√© | I don't know |

<CultureTip title="Regional Differences" flag="üá™üá∏">
Texting slang can vary between Spain and Latin America. For example, "vale" (okay) is very Spanish, while "dale" is more Latin American. Your partner might use unique expressions from their country!
</CultureTip>

## Emotional Expressions

<VocabCard
  word="Ay!"
  translation="Oh! / Ouch!"
  pronunciation="EYE"
  example="Ay, qu√© lindo! (Oh, how cute!)"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="¬øEn serio?"
  translation="Seriously? / Really?"
  pronunciation="en SEH-ryo"
  example="¬øEn serio? ¬°Qu√© bien! (Seriously? That's great!)"
/>

| Expression | Meaning | Usage |
|------------|---------|-------|
| **¬°Qu√© fuerte!** | How intense! / Wow! | Amazement |
| **¬°Genial!** | Great! / Awesome! | Excitement |
| **¬°Madre m√≠a!** | My goodness! | Surprise |
| **¬°Qu√© rollo!** | What a drag! | Annoyance |
| **¬°Mola!** | Cool! (Spain) | Approval |
| **¬°Ch√©vere!** | Cool! (Latin Am.) | Approval |

## Sweet Text Messages

<VocabCard
  word="Pienso en ti"
  translation="I'm thinking of you"
  pronunciation="PYEN-so en tee"
  example="Hola amor, pienso en ti. TKM!"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Te echo de menos"
  translation="I miss you"
  pronunciation="teh EH-cho deh MEH-nos"
  example="Te echo de menos, cari√±o. ¬øCu√°ndo vuelves?"
/>

<VocabCard
  word="Besos"
  translation="Kisses"
  pronunciation="BEH-sos"
  example="¬°Buenas noches, besos!"
/>

### Romantic Short Messages

| Message | Meaning |
|---------|---------|
| **TQ ‚ô•** | I love you |
| **Un abrazo fuerte** | A big hug |
| **Besitos** | Little kisses |
| **Muak** | Kiss sound |
| **Sue√±a conmigo** | Dream of me |
| **Dulces sue√±os** | Sweet dreams |

## Good Morning & Good Night Texts

| Spanish | English |
|---------|---------|
| **Buenos d√≠as, mi amor!** | Good morning, my love! |
| **¬øQu√© tal dormiste?** | How did you sleep? |
| **¬°Que tengas buen d√≠a!** | Have a good day! |
| **Buenas noches, cielo** | Good night, honey |
| **Duerme bien** | Sleep well |
| **¬°Hasta ma√±ana!** | See you tomorrow! |

## Common Questions and Answers

| Question | Answer |
|----------|--------|
| **¬øQu√© haces?** (What are you doing?) | Nada / Me aburro (Nothing / I'm bored) |
| **¬øD√≥nde est√°s?** (Where are you?) | En casa / En el trabajo (At home / At work) |
| **¬øCu√°ndo vuelves?** (When do you return?) | Ahora / Ya voy (Now / I'm coming) |
| **¬øTodo bien?** (Everything okay?) | S√≠ / Todo bn (Yes / All good) |

## Emoji Usage in Spanish Cultures

<CultureTip title="Emoji Culture" flag="üá™üá∏">
Spanish speakers tend to be very expressive with emojis! The üòò, ‚ù§Ô∏è, and ü•∞ are extremely common in romantic texts. Don't be shy about using them - they're expected in affectionate messages!
</CultureTip>

| Emoji | Spanish Usage |
|-------|---------------|
| üòò | Besos (Kisses) - very common |
| ‚ù§Ô∏è | Amor (Love) |
| ü•∞ | Cari√±o (Darling) |
| üòç | Me encanta (I love it) |
| üòÇ | Jaja (Laughing) |
| ü§ó | Abrazo (Hug) |
| üíã | Besitos (Kisses) |

## Reactions

<VocabCard
  word="Jajaja"
  translation="Hahaha"
  pronunciation="ha-ha-ha"
  example="Jajaja qu√© gracioso! (Hahaha how funny!)"
/>

| Reaction | Meaning | Usage |
|----------|---------|-------|
| **Jaja** | Haha | Laughing |
| **Jajaja** | Hahaha | Very funny |
| **Jeje** | Hehe | Cheeky laugh |
| **LOL** | LOL | Very common |
| **√ëam** | Yummy | For food |
| **Uy** | Ooh | Sympathy |
| **Wow** | Wow | Impressed |

## Sample Conversations

### Morning

> **You:** Buenos d√≠as amor! ¬øQu√© tal dormiste?
> **Partner:** Hola bb! Bien, so√±√© contigo. TKM!
> **You:** TKM tb. ¬øNos vemos esta noche?
> **Partner:** S√≠! Ya quiero verte üòò

### Evening

> **You:** Cari√±o, ya salgo del trabajo. ¬øD√≥nde quedamos?
> **Partner:** ¬øQu√© tal el restaurante nuevo?
> **You:** Genial! Llego en 30 min
> **Partner:** Vale! Te espero üíã

## Flirty Texts

| Spanish | English |
|---------|---------|
| **Est√°s guap√≠simo/a** | You look gorgeous |
| **No puedo dejar de pensar en ti** | I can't stop thinking about you |
| **¬øCu√°ndo te veo?** | When do I see you? |
| **Echo de menos tus besos** | I miss your kisses |
| **Eres mi vida** | You're my life |

## Pro Tips

1. **Use X for por** - "Xq" is quicker than "porque"
2. **Numbers help** - "2" can replace "tu" in some contexts
3. **Emojis are expected** - Spanish speakers love them in romantic texts
4. **Ask if unsure** - If you don't understand, just ask!

<VocabCard
  word="¬øQu√© significa eso?"
  translation="What does that mean?"
  pronunciation="keh sig-nee-FEE-ka EH-so"
  example="Perdona, ¬øqu√© significa 'mola'?"
/>

With this knowledge, you're ready for Spanish texting! Have fun messaging with your partner.

Spanska k√§rleksbrev har en l√•ng tradition av passion och poesi. Spr√•kets naturliga v√§rme g√∂r det perfekt f√∂r romantiska uttryck.

## Inledande h√§lsningar

## L√∂ften

## Exempelbrev

"Mi amor,

Te escribo esta carta porque a veces las palabras habladas no capturan todo lo que siento en mi coraz√≥n.

Desde que llegaste a mi vida, todo cambi√≥. Tu sonrisa se convirti√≥ en mi vista favorita, tu risa en mi sonido favorito.
